snippet.title: EPIC - Facebook Privacy
snippet.description: Connect with EPIC. Electronic Privacy Information Center. Focusing public attention on emerging privacy and civil liberties issues.

snippet.title: Patient Privacy Rights
snippet.description: What could your health records reveal. Protect your privacy, liberty and opportunities. 10/31/12 - 5 Held Over Apps that Stole Smartphone Info: Deborah C Peel, MD / Patient Privacy Rights.

snippet.title: snopes.com - Facebook Privacy Notice
snippet.description: Facebook Privacy Notice. Posting a legal notice on your Facebook wall will protect your copyright and privacy rights. For those of you that do not understand this posting, Facebook is now a publicly traded entity. Anyone can infringe on your right to privacy once you post on this site.

snippet.title: About Those Facebook Privacy Settings - American Civil Liberties Union
snippet.description: Blog of Rights. American Civil Liberties Union. Because freedom can't protect itself. About Those Facebook Privacy Settings. So, you've done it all right.

snippet.title: Privacy.org - The Source for News, Information, and Action
snippet.description: Facebook is currently under a 20 year consent decree from the FTC that requires Facebook to protect user privacy and to comply with the US-EU Safe Harbor guidelines.

snippet.title: Facebook Privacy Ruling
snippet.description: You're Reading a Free Preview. Facebook Privacy Ruling. 11-cr-00576-WHP Document 160. Jeff_roberts881 about 1 year ago. IPhone, iPad and Android.

snippet.title: Lifehacker \- The Always Up-to-Date Guide to Managing Your Facebook Privacy
snippet.description: Include only posts that have. Tips, tricks, and downloads for getting things done. Recommended by Whitson Gordon. X Please update your browser for a better experience on Lifehacker. Always up to date guide.

snippet.title: Facebook Help Center | Facebook
snippet.description: Get the information you need to control your sharing on Facebook. Basics. Learn the basics about privacy on Facebook.
